<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/pickups/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Modify a pickup for one or many shipments with labels already purchased.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"id","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
